description: AUTO-DISCOVERY: Get all available orientation options for robots and assets. Returns preset orientations (north/south/east/west/upright/etc.), relational patterns (facing_X), and quaternion format. Pure MOP - reads from ORIENTATION_PRESETS!

returns.presets: object mapping preset names to quaternions (w, x, y, z)

workflow_hints.when_to_use: When you need to orient robots or assets in specific directions (face table, face east, etc.)

examples.output_summary: Returns 9 preset orientations + relational pattern + manual quaternion format
examples.use_case: When planning robot/asset orientation in scene

best_practices: Use presets for simple directions (north, south, east, west)
Use relational 'facing_X' pattern for dynamic positioning (facing_table, facing_apple)
Use manual quaternions for precise rotations (advanced users only)
